materials.raw_text: B: 10 g, Ga: 40 g, Nd: 20 g, Ni: 90 g, Sc: 10 g

sourcing.instructions: B: Chemical supply stores; Ga: Specialty metal suppliers; Nd: Rare earth metal suppliers; Ni: General metal supply stores; Sc: Specialty metal suppliers.
steps: B: Chemical supply stores; Ga: Specialty metal suppliers; Nd: Rare earth metal suppliers; Ni: General metal supply stores; Sc: Specialty metal suppliers.
1. Weigh each ingredient precisely using an analytical balance.
2. In a clean glass container, combine 10 g of B and 40 g of Ga.
3. Stir the mixture with a glass rod until homogeneous.
4. Add 20 g of Nd and 90 g of Ni to the mixture.
5. Continue stirring until all powders are well integrated.
6. Finally, add 10 g of Sc and mix thoroughly for an additional 5 minutes.
preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh each ingredient precisely using an analytical balance. 
 2. In a clean glass container, combine 10 g of B and 40 g of Ga. 
 3. Stir the mixture with a glass rod until homogeneous. 
 4. Add 20 g of Nd and 90 g of Ni to the mixture. 
 5. Continue stirring until all powders are well integrated. 
 6. Finally, add 10 g of Sc and mix thoroughly for an additional 5 minutes.
